TopicTitle: I Can't move the camera and enter buildings!

Articles.Content:
KSP: 0.90 Win 32bit

Problem: Camera issues

Mods Installed: Many, but the same problem without mods. But due to debug console i think it has something to do with Trajectories mod.

Reproduction Steps:

None, probably. But have a save file: https://www./?z5t60h46dqpgh25

  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xNLDMgbgS3A
Same problem--but I can move camera. Seems to be a recent bug.

I already encoutered this issue several times and I think, I know the solution, but just to make sure it is the same, please, open the debug menu and click the "Show Input Lock Stack" button under the Cheats tab. Then post here a screenshot of it.
